CustomField.description: If checked, it will provide a DocuSign template selection list on the user interface, under the additional details section. When it is checked, recipient role selection will not be available on the user interface.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, it will provide a DocuSign template selection list on the user interface, under the additional details section. When it is checked, recipient role selection will not be available on the user interface.
CustomField.label: DocuSign Templates Enabled
